function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Manufacturing technology adaptation for producing medical equipment may pose contamination risks due to the introduction of new materials and production processes.","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination in medical equipment.","Mitigation":"Implement strict quality control measures and sanitation protocols for new manufacturing processes.","Technologies":"Advanced quality control systems, sanitation technologies.","People":"Health care workers, patients.","Owner":"Manufacturing industries, health care facilities."},{"Description":"Reduced capacity of health care workers to manage increased workload and handle medical supplies, leading to potential errors and contamination risks.","Impact":"Decreased efficiency and increased risk of errors in medication administration and waste handling.","Mitigation":"Training and support for health care workers, adoption of AI technology for data management.","Technologies":"AI data management systems, training programs for health care workers.","People":"Health care workers.","Owner":"Health care facilities, AI technology providers."}]}
